pullRequest.title: BuildMojo - Delete .jar.original for both file and directory case

nodes.bodyText: Perhaps we should call https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/master/independent-projects/bootstrap/app-model/src/main/java/io/quarkus/bootstrap/util/IoUtils.java#L58 instead as this is what we've been using everywhere until now.

commit.message: Delete .jar.original for both file and directory case
